title: Prime Rib Roast on Charcoal Grill

Ingredients.4: 2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh rosemary leaves

Ingredients.7: 1 (7 pound) beef prime rib roast, at room temperature

Ingredients.8: 2 cups wood chips, or as needed (Optional)

Directions.1: Mix olive oil, garlic, pepper, rosemary, salt, and beef base together in a bowl. Cover beef roast completely with the rub.

Directions.2: Heat a charcoal smoker to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) on indirect heat. Place the roast directly on the grill grate with a drip pan underneath. Add wood chips according to manufacturer's directions.

Directions.3: Smoke until an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center of the roast reads at least 125 degrees F (52 degrees C), about 2 hours and 30 minutes.
